org.odftoolkit.odfdom.utils

Class ResourceUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.odftoolkit.odfdom.utils.ResourceUtilities

  • public final class ResourceUtilities
extends Object
    Test utility class providing resources for the test in- and output

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String getAbsolutePath(String relativeFilePath)
      The relative path of the test file will be resolved and the absolute will be returned
      static String getTestOutput(String relativeFilePath)
      The relative path of the test file will be used to determine an absolute path to a temporary directory in the output directory.
      static String getTestOutputFolder() 
      static InputStream getTestResourceAsStream(String relativeFilePath)
      The Input of the test file will be resolved and the absolute will be returned
      static URI getURI(String relativeFilePath)
      The relative path of the test file will be resolved and the absolute will be returned
      static File newTestOutputFile(String relativeFilePath)

    • Method Detail

      • getAbsolutePath

        public static String getAbsolutePath(String relativeFilePath)
                              throws FileNotFoundException
        The relative path of the test file will be resolved and the absolute will be returned
        Parameters:
        relativeFilePath - Path of the test resource relative to src/test/resource/.
        Returns:
        the absolute path of the test file
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - If the file could not be found

      • getURI

        public static URI getURI(String relativeFilePath)
                  throws URISyntaxException
        The relative path of the test file will be resolved and the absolute will be returned
        Parameters:
        relativeFilePath - Path of the test resource relative to src/test/resource/.
        Returns:
        the URI created based on the relativeFilePath
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException - if no URI could be created from the given relative path

      • getTestOutput

        public static String getTestOutput(String relativeFilePath)
                            throws IOException
        The relative path of the test file will be used to determine an absolute path to a temporary directory in the output directory.
        Parameters:
        relativeFilePath - Path of the test resource relative to src/test/resource/.
        Returns:
        absolute path to a test output
        Throws:
        IOException - if no absolute Path could be created.

      • getTestResourceAsStream

        public static InputStream getTestResourceAsStream(String relativeFilePath)
        The Input of the test file will be resolved and the absolute will be returned
        Parameters:
        relativeFilePath - Path of the test resource relative to src/test/resource/.
        Returns:
        the absolute path of the test file

      • newTestOutputFile

        public static File newTestOutputFile(String relativeFilePath)
        Relative to the test output directory a test file will be returned dependent on the relativeFilePath provided.
        Parameters:
        relativeFilePath - Path of the test output resource relative to target/test-classes/.
        Returns:
        the empty File of the test output (to be filled)

      • getTestOutputFolder

        public static String getTestOutputFolder()
        Returns:
        the absolute path of the test output folder, which is usually target/test-classes/.
